name: Abhishek Ramesh
title: Machine Learning Engineer
bio: I am a Machine Learning Engineer with a Data Science graduate degree from UT Austin. I have worked on a range of ML/AI tech stacks from computer vision to data engineering to LLMs. I currently work at Kaiser Permanente where I build and maintain AI systems that save millions annually and data pipelines that process 1TB/daily. I am passionate about understanding technical solutions and their business models.
